sentence.Network_en: She stood looking at him for an instant, then felt at the zipper of her overalls.
sentence.Network_cn: 她站着看他一会儿, 便伸手去拉工作服的拉链.

sentence.Network_en: I can't , " and made a zipper motion across his mouth . "
sentence.Network_cn: 然后他在他的 嘴边 做了一个拉链的动作.

entry.def: A zipper is a device used to open and close parts of clothes and bags. It consists of two rows of metal or plastic teeth which separate or fasten together as you pull a small tag along them.

means.word_mean: 1. a fastener for locking together two toothed edges by means of a sliding tab
